CHAT.comment: at the start of the recording June is standing by her mother with a book in her hand.

u.a: June is standing holding a toy train , she drops it and picks up a book .
June gives the book to her mother .
mother points after naming each item
silence during which June turns several pages back in the book .
June becomes fascinated with her mother's necklace .
June pulls at her mother's necklace again .
mother takes the necklace out of June's hand .
June gets hold of it again .
June still holding on to the necklace .
mother puts down the book she is holding .
June looks down and sees the book , she picks it up .
June gives the book to her mother again .
mother points but June turns the page , mother points to the things on the next two pages .
pointing to the toy ducks on the floor .
June turns the page , she crouches by the book , looks at the page and laughs .
June taps the page repeatedly , mother points to the cat .
June turns the page without answering .
mother puts the book on June's lap , June pushes it away .
mother hands the book to June again .
June turns the page and points to the cat on the new page .
June turns away and gets another book .
June hands the book to her mother .
mother unfolds the book and June points to a picture .
silence during which June turns several pages , mother hands the book to June , June pushes it away .
June pushes the book away again .
mother offers the book but June still pushes it away .
mother offers the book again , June opens the book .

mother picks up a red riding hood doll , this doll has three different forms , held one way it looks like red riding hood , then when it's turned upside down the skirts fall over and reveal grandma's head , then grandma's bonnet can be pulled forward and when the doll is turned round it looks like the wolf .
June takes the doll from her mother and nurses it .
mother takes the doll and acts out the story , June watches .
mother inverts the doll to reveal grandma .
mother teases June with the doll .
June takes the doll and holds it .
June touches the hood on the doll .
silence , June drops the doll and reaches out for her mother's necklace again .
June growls , mother laughs , mother growls .
mother picks up the doll and shows the wolf's face .
mother growls . June growls . mother growls again .
mother shakes the wolf in June's face .
silence during which mother teases June with the doll , June turns .
June hands a book to her mother .
mother opens the book and reads .
June turns the page , the books slips off mother's knee .
mother catches the book . mother turns the page .
silence during which June looks at the page .
June looks and then turns the page .
June touches the page and then turns several pages , June looks very closely at the picture and laughs .
no response , June turns more pages .
June puts a shape into the shapesorter . mother gets the shapesorter .
June puts another shape into the shapesorter .
mother hands the book to June .
June makes a turning gesture with her fingers .
mother holds the book out to June .
June hands the book back to her mother .
mother hands the book back to June .
mother points to the page and holds it out to June , June pushes it away .
June reaches out and picks up another book
mother holds the book out to June .
silence , June turns several pages , mother offers the book to her .
June pushes the book away , June picks up a toy telephone .
June holds the phone out to her mother .
mother takes the phone , puts the receiver on the base and holds it out to June , June pushes it aside .
mother sets the phone up again and June throws it aside , mother gets the phone again and makes it ring .
mother hands the phone to June .
June gets exasperated , flaps her arms around and cries .
June picks up the whole phone and throws it away again .
mother pulls a toy train along the floor in front of June .
June watches the train and giggles , mother hands the string to June .
June flaps the string away from here and cries .
mother continues to pull the train along the floor .
June picks up the train and throws it away , June picks up a bobby pin .
mother has a book in her hand , June looks at it .
June looks at the bobby pin very closely and tries to put it in her hair .
mother looks for a different book .
mother gets a book from the bookshelf .
silence , June touches the cover of the book she is holding , it has a train on it .
June drops the book she is holding and reaches out for the toy phone .
mother puts the phone in the center of the rug .
silence , June goes back to playing with the bobby pin .
mother picks up the phone again .
mother hands the phone to June .
June pushes the phone away again .
June picks up a book and hands it to her mother .
June turns the page , silence during which June looks at the book .
mother gets the bug out of the toybox .
silence . June watches mother pull the bug along the floor .
June picks up a soft toy and hugs it .
June drops the toy and gets a book .
mother holds the book open and shows the page to June .
June ignores the book and looks in the toybox .
mother moves the toybox into the camera's view , silence during which June picks out a candy cane holder and examines it closely , then she hands it to her mother .
silence during which June pulls off the handle and then replaces it , June takes the holder back again .
silence during which June continues to examine the candy cane holder , then she picks up a book and hands it to her mother .
mother holds the book out to June and shows her the cover .
mother puts the book down , June picks the book up again and hands it back to her mother again .
June hands the holder to her mother again .
June takes the holder back again .
silence during which June removes the handle from the holder and then replaces it and then examines the holder closely for several minutes .
June removes the handle from the holder and holds it out to her mother .
silence , June picks up the toy phone again .
she holds it out to her mother
mother puts the receiver on the base and holds it out to June
mother makes the phone ring and picks up the receiver
silence during which June continues to examine the candy cane holder
June hands the book to her mother .
mother opens the book and holds it out towards June
mother looks in the toybox , June looks at the book .
June sees a ball in the toybox .
mother gets a tennis ball out of the toybox .
June sees a book in the toybox .
silence during which June goes back to examining the holder , mother looks in the toybox .
June picks the book out of the box .
June hands the book to her mother .
June pulls the handle off the holder and hands it to her mother .
mother puts the candy cane holder part on the floor .
June hands a soft toy duck to her mother .
mother teases June with the toy .
June opens the book she is holding .
June holds the book out towards her mother .
shows June the picture on the book cover
June picks up the phone receiver again .
silence , June walks across the room and picks up a book .
June brings the book to her mother .
June goes back across the room and gets another book .
silence during which June looks at the second book .
it is the seashore book , she unfolds it
she brings it to her mother .
mother takes the book and unfolds it completely and holds it out to June .
mother folds the book up and hands it to June .
June attempts to unfold the book and becomes frustrated and cries , June tosses the book across the room , mother teases June with a soft toy duck .
June picks up a book , a pets book and tries again .
no response , June opens the book .
silence during which June looks at the book and turns several pages .
June gets an old card out of the toybox .
mother moves the toybox so that it's easier to get to .
there is a ball on the card
June is hidden from the camera by the room heater .
June goes to the toybox and hands a plastic glove puppet to her mother .
June puts the puppet to her face .
June puts the puppet on her hand and puts it to her face .
June holds the puppet out to her mother .
silence during which June looks closely at the puppet .
June holds the puppet out again
silence during which June flaps the puppeted hand at her mother
mother teases June with the toy duck again
June holds the puppet out to her mother
June hands the puppet to her mother .
mother puts the puppet on her own hand and teases June with it .
June is trying to trap her mother's hand .
June takes the puppet off her mother's hand and screws it up small .
June holds the screwed up puppet out to her mother .
June moves the puppet before her mother can get hold of it , then she holds it out again and her mother takes it .
mother hands the puppet back to June , June opens the puppet , mother gets a ball , June drops the puppet and gets a soft toy rabbit and hands it to her mother .
June puts her face close to the rabbit , mother teases her with it , silence .
June gets a toy dog out of the toybox , retrieves the rabbit from her mother and then looks at them both , then she hands the rabbit back to her mother .
mother tease June with the rabbit .
June gives the dog to her mother , mother offers the rabbit to June .
June picks up the toy telephone again .
June holds the rabbit to the phone .
June puts the receiver to mother's ear .
June takes the phone from her mother's ear .
June replaces the phone by her mother's ear .
June won't allow her mother to move the phone from her ear .
mother takes the phone from her ear .
June pulls a book out of the toybox .
June hands the book to her mother .
June wanders off into the kitchen area with something out of the shapesorter .
June returns , mother picks up a shape .
mother places the shape in the correct hole .
June tries to put one of the shapes through the wrong hole .
mother rotates the shapesorter to find the correct hole .
June has another shape in her hand , mother points again .
mother helps to drop the shape .
